hints.content:
We can think of subtraction as:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} - \blueE{\text{part}} = \goldE{\text{ part}}$

We can relate subtraction to addition:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} = \blueE{\text{part}} + \goldE{\text{ part}}$

So, we can add $\blueE{24}$ to $\goldE{43}$ to find the $\maroonD{\text{total}}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a06b2b09be781c1480a5c0f813c42bef50cec18d)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve.*

 [[☃ numeric-input 1]] ${}-24=43$  

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/801d127cb01d02dfe06f50b729fce41bc0ce645e)
